title: Hobby Lobby Ruling May Have Poked A Hole in The 'Corporate Veil'
teaser: Legal scholars are still sorting out the possible implications of the Supreme Court's Hobby Lobby decision. While the case dealt directly with birth control coverage and the Affordable Care Act, it could even be cited in future bankruptcy cases.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
